thread.title: Khloe Kardashian exposes her black bra in netted top
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian exposes her black bra in netted top | Daily Mail Online

author: Heidi Parker For Dailymail.com
title: Khloe Kardashian exposes her black bra in netted top
text:
Khloe Kardashian's friend Jen Atkin has been sharing some lovely photos of Khloe Kardashian.
First the hair stylist put up an image of the 32-year-old beauty in a white lace corset. Because the item was see-through, the glam expert put red hearts on the reality star's nipples.
Then the glam queen added a shot of the E! star in a black bra with a netted top.
A lot of show here: Khloe Kardashian's friend Jen Atkin has been sharing some lovely photos of Khloe Kardashian
New: On Wednesday the glam queen added a shot of the E! star in a black bra with a netted top
The blonde looked ready for her closeup in the see through top.
The KUWTK star added skintight leggings that revealed toned legs.
And she had her tressed up in a sexy ponytail that screamed cheerleader.
Cheerful: And she had her tressed up in a sexy ponytail that screamed cheerleader
Naughty: Khloe's friend Jen Atkin took to Instagram to share a photo of the 32-year-old beauty in a white lace corset
Soon to be Mrs Thompson? This photo emerges just as UsWeekly claimed the blonde is interested in getting married to beau Tristan Thompson. Pictured in Florida in 2016
Jen wrote in her caption: 'Back w my little A1 from Day 1 @khloekardashian ❤️❤️ @joycebonelli #jenatkinhair @goodamerican @revengebody.'
It appears as if the daughter of Kris Jenner, 62, was being styled for her reality series Revenge Body, which has been enjoying a successful first season.
Khloe looked hardly camera ready though with her white lace corset and nothing else on.
Out with her sisters: The curvy star wore lace-up jeans to meet up with Kim and Kourtney at Casa Vega in Sherman Oaks on Wednesday
The diva had her blonde locks ironed straight and her makeup was heavily dramatic with black eye liner and red lips.
The ex of Lamar Odom also wore a cross around her neck.
These photos emerge just as UsWeekly claimed the blonde bombshell is very much interested in getting married to her beau of five months, basketball star Tristan Thompson, 25, of the Cleveland Cavaliers.
The site claimed that the TV darling is so happy with her beau she wants to marry him.
Hey look at me: The Calabasas native has been pushing a sexy image for her jeans company Good American
More lace! Here the siren wore black lingerie to promote the brand
'They've talked about getting married,' a source told the publication.
She's be happy about an engagement,' it was added by the friend.
Even though her marriage to Odom ended with him cheating and nearly dying from a drug overdose, she is up for a second trip to the altar because the athlete has been so wonderful.
Tip-top shape: The blonde showed off her abs as she posed with her models
'Tristan is unbelievably good to her,' said the source. And she feels she has a special connection with the dribbler. 'She didn't think she was ever going to have that again after Lamar.'
And the K gang is up for it. 'The family loves Tristan and wants to see this work.' And it appears that Khloe is not worried that he had a baby with another woman.
In December he reportedly welcomed a child with ex-girlfriend Jordan Craig.
